name: Cruo Domine
description:
Survive in a hostile space environment with randomized damage, drop and enemy strength. Adjust difficulty yourself dynamically with upgrading weapons, but be careful not always the upgrade succeeds.




Players can use Weapons to fight their way through space in hostile environment of space ship. Not only Dual Wielding of weapons but also a upgrades are possible. Players can upgrade weapons with components that drop from enemies or use these components for advancing in story. Weapons and projectiles can lead to dismemberment.
